## Base DiD Model

```{r base_did_model}
fit_did_model <- function(outcome_var, data) {
    formula_str <- paste0(
        outcome_var, " ~ post_event + log(ncloc + 1) + log(age + 1) +
    log(contributors + 1) + log(stars + 1) +
    log(issues + 1) | repo_name + time"
    )

    model <- feols(as.formula(formula_str), data = data)
    return(model)
}

fit_multiple_did_models <- function(outcome_vars, data) {
    models_list <- list()

    for (outcome in names(outcome_vars)) {
        models_list[[outcome_vars[outcome]]] <- fit_did_model(outcome, data)
    }

    return(models_list)
}

did_models <- fit_multiple_did_models(outcome_variables, panel_data)

modelsummary(did_models,
    title = "Impact of Cursor Adoption on Development Metrics",
    stars = TRUE,
    gof_omit = "AIC|BIC|RMSE|FE|R2 Within Adj.|(R2$)|Std",
    coef_map = c(
        "post_event" = "Post Cursor Adoption",
        "log(ncloc + 1)" = "Log Lines of Code",
        "log(age + 1)" = "Log Age (days)",
        "log(contributors + 1)" = "Log Contributors",
        "log(stars + 1)" = "Log Stars",
        "log(issues + 1)" = "Log Issues",
        "log(issue_comments + 1)" = "Log Issue Comments"
    ),
    fmt = 3,
    estimate = "{estimate}{stars}"
)
```

## Treatment Effect Heterogeneity Analysis

```{r heterogeneity_analysis}
heterogeneity_data <- panel_data %>%
    group_by(repo_name) %>%
    mutate(
        age_at_treatment = age[time == event][1],
        ncloc_at_treatment = ncloc[time == event][1]
    ) %>%
    ungroup()

cursor_commits_data <- panel_data %>%
    filter(post_event == 1) %>%
    group_by(repo_name) %>%
    summarize(total_cursor_commits = sum(commits, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
    ungroup()

heterogeneity_data <- heterogeneity_data %>%
    left_join(cursor_commits_data, by = "repo_name")

age_median <- median(heterogeneity_data$age_at_treatment[!is.na(heterogeneity_data$age_at_treatment)])
ncloc_median <- median(heterogeneity_data$ncloc_at_treatment[!is.na(heterogeneity_data$ncloc_at_treatment)])
cursor_commits_median <- median(cursor_commits_data$total_cursor_commits)
print(paste("Age Median:", age_median))
print(paste("NCLoc Median:", ncloc_median))
print(paste("Cursor Commits Median:", cursor_commits_median))

heterogeneity_data <- heterogeneity_data %>%
    mutate(
        high_age = age_at_treatment > age_median,
        high_ncloc = ncloc_at_treatment > ncloc_median,
        high_cursor_commits = total_cursor_commits > cursor_commits_median
    )

low_age_data <- heterogeneity_data %>% filter(!high_age)
high_age_data <- heterogeneity_data %>% filter(high_age)
low_ncloc_data <- heterogeneity_data %>% filter(!high_ncloc)
high_ncloc_data <- heterogeneity_data %>% filter(high_ncloc)
low_cursor_commits_data <- heterogeneity_data %>% filter(!high_cursor_commits)
high_cursor_commits_data <- heterogeneity_data %>% filter(high_cursor_commits)

heterogeneity_outcomes <- c(
    "log(commits + 1)" = "Commits",
    "log(lines_added + 1)" = "Lines Added",
    #"log(delta_code_smells + 1)" = "New Code Smells",
    #"log(delta_bugs + 1)" = "New Bugs",
    "comment_lines_density" = "Comment Lines Density",
    "log(cognitive_complexity + 1)" = "Cognitive Complexity"
)

young_models <- fit_multiple_did_models(heterogeneity_outcomes, low_age_data)
old_models <- fit_multiple_did_models(heterogeneity_outcomes, high_age_data)
small_models <- fit_multiple_did_models(heterogeneity_outcomes, low_ncloc_data)
large_models <- fit_multiple_did_models(heterogeneity_outcomes, high_ncloc_data)
low_commits_models <- fit_multiple_did_models(heterogeneity_outcomes, low_cursor_commits_data)
high_commits_models <- fit_multiple_did_models(heterogeneity_outcomes, high_cursor_commits_data)

extract_treatment_effect <- function(model) {
    coef_table <- summary(model)$coeftable
    estimate <- coef_table["post_event", "Estimate"]
    p_value <- coef_table["post_event", "Pr(>|t|)"]
    stars <- ifelse(p_value < 0.001, "***",
        ifelse(p_value < 0.01, "**",
            ifelse(p_value < 0.05, "*", "")
        )
    )
    result <- paste0(sprintf("%.3f", estimate), stars)
    return(result)
}

heterogeneity_results <- data.frame(
    Outcome = names(heterogeneity_outcomes),
    YoungProjects = sapply(young_models, extract_treatment_effect),
    OldProjects = sapply(old_models, extract_treatment_effect),
    SmallProjects = sapply(small_models, extract_treatment_effect),
    LargeProjects = sapply(large_models, extract_treatment_effect),
    LowCursorCommits = sapply(low_commits_models, extract_treatment_effect),
    HighCursorCommits = sapply(high_commits_models, extract_treatment_effect)
)

rownames(heterogeneity_results) <- heterogeneity_outcomes

knitr::kable(heterogeneity_results,
    caption = "Treatment Effect Heterogeneity by Project Age, Size, and Cursor Usage",
    col.names = c(
        "Outcome", "Young Projects", "Old Projects",
        "Small Projects", "Large Projects",
        "Low Cursor Commits", "High Cursor Commits"
    )
)
```

## Panel Event Study Models

```{r panel_event_study, fig.width=12, fig.height=9}
# Function to fit event study model
fit_event_study <- function(outcome_var, data) {
    formula_str <- paste0(
        outcome_var, " ~ lead_6 + lead_5 + lead_4 + lead_3 + lead_2 +
        lag_0 + lag_1 + lag_2 + lag_3 + lag_4 + lag_5 + lag_6 +
        log(ncloc + 1) + log(age + 1) + log(contributors + 1) + log(stars + 1) +
        log(issues + 1) | repo_name + time"
    )

    model <- feols(as.formula(formula_str), data = data)
    return(model)
}

# Fit models for each outcome
event_models <- list(
    commits = fit_event_study("log(commits + 1)", panel_data),
    lines = fit_event_study("log(lines_added + 1)", panel_data),
    #new_code_smells = fit_event_study("log(delta_code_smells + 1)", panel_data),
    #new_bugs = fit_event_study("log(delta_bugs + 1)", panel_data),
    complexity = fit_event_study("log(cognitive_complexity + 1)", panel_data),
    #duplicated_lines_density = fit_event_study("duplicated_lines_density", panel_data)
    comment_lines_density = fit_event_study("comment_lines_density", panel_data)
    #bugs = fit_event_study("log(bugs + 1)", panel_data),
    #code_smells = fit_event_study("log(code_smells + 1)", panel_data)
    #technical_lag = fit_event_study("log(average_technical_lag + 1)", panel_data),
    #vulnerable_deps = fit_event_study("log(num_vulnerable_dependencies + 1)", panel_data)
)

# Function to extract coefficients and CIs
get_event_data <- function(model, outcome_name) {
    coefs <- coef(model)
    ci <- confint(model)
    pvals <- summary(model)$coeftable[, 4]

    time_periods <- c(-6:6) # Changed to include 0
    estimates <- numeric(length(time_periods))
    conf_low <- numeric(length(time_periods))
    conf_high <- numeric(length(time_periods))
    p_values <- numeric(length(time_periods))
    is_significant <- logical(length(time_periods))

    for (i in seq_along(time_periods)) {
        t <- time_periods[i]
        var_name <- if (t < 0) paste0("lead_", abs(t)) else paste0("lag_", t)

        estimates[i] <- coefs[var_name]
        conf_low[i] <- ci[var_name, 1]
        conf_high[i] <- ci[var_name, 2]
        p_values[i] <- pvals[var_name]

        is_significant[i] <- p_values[i] < 0.05
    }

    data.frame(
        time = time_periods,
        estimate = estimates,
        conf.low = conf_low,
        conf.high = conf_high,
        p_value = p_values,
        is_significant = is_significant,
        outcome = outcome_name
    )
}

# Combine all results
plot_data <- rbind(
    get_event_data(event_models$commits, "Commits"),
    get_event_data(event_models$lines, "Lines Added"),
    #get_event_data(event_models$new_code_smells, "New Code Smells"),
    #get_event_data(event_models$new_bugs, "New Bugs"),
    get_event_data(event_models$complexity, "Cognitive Complexity"),
    get_event_data(event_models$comment_lines_density, "Comment Lines Density")
    #get_event_data(event_models$bugs, "bugs"),
    #get_event_data(event_models$code_smells, "Code Smells")
    #get_event_data(event_models$duplicated_lines_density, "Duplicated Lines Density")
    #get_event_data(event_models$technical_lag, "Technical Lag"),
    #get_event_data(event_models$vulnerable_deps, "Vulnerable Dependencies")
)

# Plot all outcomes
ggplot(plot_data, aes(x = time, y = estimate, color = outcome)) +
    # Use different shapes based on significance
    geom_point(aes(shape = is_significant), size = 3, position = position_dodge(width = 0.3)) +
    scale_shape_manual(values = c("FALSE" = 1, "TRUE" = 16)) + # 1=hollow circle, 16=filled circle
    geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = conf.low, ymax = conf.high),
        width = 0.2,
        position = position_dodge(width = 0.3)
    ) +
    geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", color = "red") +
    geom_vline(xintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", color = "blue") +
    facet_wrap(~outcome, scales = "free_y", nrow = 4, ncol = 2) +
    labs(
        title = "Event Study: Effects of Cursor Adoption",
        x = "Months Relative to Adoption",
        y = "Coefficient Estimate",
        color = "Outcome",
        shape = "Significant (p<0.05)"
    ) +
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(
        legend.position = "bottom",
        legend.box = "horizontal",
        plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 10, color = "darkblue")
    )
```
